name: Shumo Chu
bio: Shumo Chu is the founder of NEBRA Labs (nebra.one), a research and development organization aims for realizing proof singularity. Shumo obtained his PhD from University of Washington on Formal Methods and Database Systems. He was working at Algorand as a research scientist and at UCSB as an assistant professor. Prior NEBRA, Shumo was one of the co-founders of Manta Network, a privacy preserving protocol.
